timeline.message: Be better, one day at a time. Also fix nasty concurrency issue.
Rework lock watch updates and registration
Do not filter unlocks for replayer
Add test for snapshot reflecting events logged during open locks calculation
Expose the interface that we need to get lock watch updates as an atlas client
Use lock watch start transactions endpoint for transaction starter

timeline.body: can this ever be hit via api? can we just throw a Http level error? or have an exception mapper that captures said exception? otherwise we just get a 500

replies.bodyText: This is completely on the client side, just doesn't support lock watching in general
replies.author: gmaretic

timeline.body: why have this be optional if you have a noop version?
timeline.bodyText: why have this be optional if you have a noop version?
timeline.bodyHTML: why have this be optional if you have a noop version?

replies.bodyText: I think when this was originally written we needed an rpc client for the noop impl, but given that we have timelock here, we can just derive what we need when get commit timestamp gets added
replies.author: gmaretic
